name: The 3D Scanning Wiki
text: A github hosed wiki for all things 3D scanning: photogrammetry, lidar, laser scanning and more. The page is a static website built from a github repository with markdown files.

name: Aqualetics Coach
text: A internal web app for swim schools. Developed specifically for the 'Kids' program of Swiss Swimming. Live in production since August 2019.

name: ScBirs Website
text: The website of the 'ScBirs' swim club. This website serves as the center of all information distribution for the swimclub.
